answers.text: Depreciation expense is a contra-asset account with debit balance
Depreciation expense is a contra-asset account with credit balance
Accumulated depreciation is a contra-asset account with debit balance
Accumulated depreciation is a contra-asset account with credit balance

question: Closing entries at the end of an accounting period are not applied to:
Under terms FOB destination, who will pay transportation cost?
Which statement is true about FIFO and LIFO method, knowing that prices of merchandise purchased increase over time?

answers.text: FIFO produces higher COGS and lower ending inventory than LIFO
FIFO produces lower COGS and higher ending inventory than LIFO
FIFO produces lower COGS and lower ending inventory than LIFO
FIFO produces higher COGS and higher ending inventory than LIFO
